project_preview_description.text: StartDuck is a productivity app that generates activities based on user's choice of category and input hours.

project_description.text: Almost everyone has something they'd be interested in learning how to do, whether it's cooking or learning to speak a new language, but they're just not sure how to get started. Just tell StartDuck what you want to learn and how much time you're willing to commit, and you'll get activities that will help you work towards your goal and fit right into your schedule.
Stacks: React, React Router, Ant Design UI Framework for front-end, and Ruby on Rails for back-end, and PostgreSQL for database.

siteMetadata.title: Jerry Chuang's Portfolio
siteMetadata.description: A portfolio powered by Gatsby and Prismic to showcase portfolios and blogs.
siteMetadata.author: Jerry Chuang
